message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $15000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13000. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product.
